attributes.action: hold a referendum on whether the United Kingdom replaces our trident nuclear weapons.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Seeing as it is inconceivable that the UK would ever fire a nuclear weapon at any other country or terrorist organisation, there is absolutely no sense in our developing a replacement for trident.
Neither this Prime Minister or any future Prime Minister has the right to commit the citizens of the UK, and the rest of the world, to a Nuclear war without consuting the people.
The estimated £2 billion a year (which will double) could be better used to supply our forces with the finest equiptment available, fully fund the NHS and build thousands of low priced starter homes for our young families  starting out.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
